descriptionHtml:
The BRODST has officially begun their takeover of Skyrim. Gather up the legendary gentlemen in this epic follower pack featuring none other than:

Jarl Kosak the Mystic; a powerful mage capable of making a dragon his bitch. His prison bitch that is. The Wizard of Kosak will visit you in your home if he desires you sexually.

The Bouck; A guy with a bow who likes to do things. Like swim naked in the pond by Dragonsreach. or something.

Ed the Berserker King; A fierce warrior filled with incredible rage. When not out destroying things, He can usually be found getting smashed at the Winking Skeever.

Jarl Zed the Grimm; A Battleaxe weilding Companion capable of bringing down the toughest foes with ease.

Ga'vnn Darkfur; This sneaky cat-man will kill you before you even know he's there. Or at least if the last victim didn't notice him first.

This mod has no requirements other than vanilla Skyrim, but is made WAY better with Ultimate Follower Mod. If you can gather them all, you will be unstoppable.
author: OfficialBRODST
